meaning_str.bing:
n. 能力；能够；才能；能干
网络. 才干；技能；本领

能力；才能；技能；本领；才智；才华；才干

1.en: In a twinkling doing on the aggressive, flaw+ground put out to cut of medley technical ability one of the Pa beat on black wild tiger.
1.cn: 瞬间发动攻势，破绽+碎灭斩的组合技能啪的一声打在黑野虎的身上。

2.en: It is desirable to grant us the exclusive right to sell portable cassette recorders after you know our ability to sell.
2.cn: 希望你方在了解我们的销售能力以后，会考虑给我们手提盒式录音机的独家经销权。

3.en: Go up in the assurance of a few relations especially, if appear deviation, can affect ability of team of basic level cadre increase.
3.cn: 特别是在一些关系的把握上，如果出现偏差，就会影响基层干部队伍能力的增强。

0.en: Not height, vision, athleticism, or ability to digest dairy products.
0.cn: 绝非在身高，视力，运动能力或消化乳制品这几个领域吧。

1.en: There are decisions to be made in there that will affect not only her ability to be a surgeon, her speech, her ability to function, her life.
1.cn: 在手术室里会有很多决定，不仅会影响她是否能继续当医生，还会影响语言能力，行动能力，甚至性命。

2.en: This is an effort that America has the unique ability to lead.
2.cn: 这是美国完全有能力领导的行动。

3.en: I'm a scientist. My ability to think is my bread and butter.
3.cn: 我是个科学家，我靠我的思考能力吃饭。

4.en: Now, Element Lad's ability is the power to transmute chemical elements.
4.cn: 元素少年的超能力是转化化学元素。

5.en: And this is the Omega. And the Omega has the ability to control time.
5.cn: 它就是Ω，它有一种控制时间的能力。

6.en: Cage. You've seized control of the Omega's ability to reset the day.
6.cn: 凯奇你掌握了它控制时间的能力，可以随时重启当天。

7.en: With neither the access nor the ability to acquire the weapons they were transporting.
7.cn: 他们并没有能力或权限接触他们运送的这些武器。

8.en: It is the ability to reshape the universe. Together the pillars form a space bridge.
8.cn: 它具有重塑宇宙的能力，集结所有传送柱就能形成空间桥。

9.en: How is that my fault? You have destroyed my ability to tolerate idiots. Now, come with me.
9.cn: 这不是我的错吧？你毁了我容忍傻逼的能力，现在跟我走。

10.en: And as exquisite as this array of emotions is even more sublime is the ability to turn it off.
10.cn: 这一系列的情感如此美丽精致，但更为崇高的是将其关闭的能力。

11.en: If you could acquire this ability, and with practice you can, you will radically improve your life.
11.cn: 有了这种能力，再加上实战演练，你就能极大地改善自己的生活。

12.en: It wasn't that the music was lacking, it was my ability to appreciate it and to hear it in the right way.
12.cn: 问题不在于音乐不够好，而在于我没有能力去欣赏，是我听的方式不对。

13.en: Are you serious? I've mastered the ability of standing so incredibly still that I become invisible to the eye. Watch.
13.cn: 你不是吧？我已经掌握了纹丝不动站立的能力肉眼是看不到我的。看好了。

14.en: Well, I guess he's just gonna have to grow up. Grow up? You think if he had that ability, he wouldn't have used it yet?
14.cn: 我猜他只能学着成长了。成长？你觉得如果他有这能力他还会是现在这幅样子吗？

15.en: Which is a fantastic story, unless you think about humanity's footprint on the planet and our ability to keep up food production.
15.cn: 这是个神奇的故事，当然还有人类遍布全球的足迹和我们追赶粮食产量的能力。

16.en: And if that person has the ability to snap his fingers and erase the value of that empire, you have to make sure you have a contingency.
16.cn: 如果这个人有动动手指就能抹去整个帝国价值的能力，你得确保你有应急措施。

17.en: You know, dealing with cold feet is an important part of being both best man and maid of honor. Maybe we should test for that ability.
17.cn: 处理婚礼前的怯场情绪也是伴娘伴郎的重要任务之一。也许我们应该测试一下这项能力。

18.en: As I've explained repeatedly to Dr. Koothrappali, whose ability to comprehend the American idiom fails him when it's convenient.
18.cn: 我已经再三向库萨帕里博士解释过了，以他对美国俗语的理解能力，是不能明白什么叫做时机妥当的。

19.en: They're holding umbrellas. What? The ducks in my tub. They're whimsical because ducks have neither a need for, nor the ability to use, umbrellas.
19.cn: 他们都撑着伞的。什么？我浴缸里的鸭子。它们怪就怪在这些鸭子既没有需要也没有能力来使用雨伞。
